column4: ubuntu upgraded kernel and some stuff, now all is slower, what do i do?
do you use proprietary video drivers?
it should rebuild the video kernel driver and may help
can you give a pastebin of the output of:  sudo lshw -C display; lsb_release -a; uname -a
you are using the open source driver  'driver=radeon'
uninstall the proprietary driver then reinstall it, may help
works in some cases, like older ATi chips
it seems to have worked, thanks
np man, may be a bug, not tried a newer release?
or you can run:  which firefox
